item.title: Slice well
item.description: In this post, I briefly review a few methods to select rows and/or columns of a DataFrame that satisfy one or more criteria. I then introduce two additional requirements that arises frequently in practice–slicing with previously unknown criteria and managing serialization and deserialization to recover the desired data structure.
